class.name: CALayer
class.description: Manages image-based content and allows you to perform animations on that content.

class.name: NSArray
class.description: Creates static arrays.

class.name: NSEnumerator
class.description: Abstract class, instances of whose subclasses enumerate collections of other objects, such as arrays and dictionaries.

class.name: NSFetchRequest
class.description: Describes search criteria used to retrieve data from a persistent store.

class.name: NSEntityDescription
class.description: Describes describes an entity in Core Data.

class.name: NSObject
class.description: NSObject is the root class of most Objective-C class hierarchies. Through NSObject, objects inherit a basic interface to the runtime system and the ability to behave as Objective-C objects.

class.name: NSSelectorFromString
class.description: The NSString class declares the programmatic interface for an object that manages immutable strings.

class.name: NSString
class.description: The NSString class declares the programmatic interface for an object that manages immutable strings.

class.name: NSMutableString
class.description: Manages a mutable string -that is, a string whose contents can be edited

class.name: NSRegularExpression
class.description: Represent and apply regular expressions to Unicode strings. Used often for input validation.

class.name: NSPredicate
class.description: Used to define logical conditions used to constrain a search either for a fetch or for in-memory filtering.

class.name: NSException
class.description: NSException is used to implement exception handling and contains information about an exception.

class.name: NSAlert
class.description: NSAlert displays an alert, either as an application-modal dialog or as a sheet attached to a document window.

function.name: NSLog
function.description: Writes output to the console, under control of the string pointed to by format

function.name: NSSelectorFromString
function.description: Returns the selector with a given name.

class.name: SEL
class.description: Represents a method selector.

class.name: NSFileManager
class.description: NSFileManager enables you to perform many generic file-system operations and insulates an app from the underlying file system.

class.name: NSManagedObject
class.description: Generic class that implements all the basic behavior required of a Core Data model object

class.name: NSMutableArray
class.description: Mutable ordered collection of objects

class.name: NSMapTable
class.description: Mutable collection of associations of keys and values.

class.name: NSHashTable
class.description: Mutable collection of associations of keys and values.

class.name: NSDictionary
class.description: Declares the programmatic interface to objects that manage immutable associations of keys and values.

class.name: NSMutableDictionary
class.description: Mutable collection of associations of keys and values.

class.name: NSSet
class.description: Declares the programmatic interface for static sets of distinct objects.

class.name: NSMutableSet
class.description: Declares the programmatic interface to a mutable, unordered collection of distinct objects.

class.name: NSCountedSet
class.description: Declares the programmatic interface to a mutable, unordered collection of distinct objects.

class.name: UIApplicationDelegate
class.description: Defines methods called by the singleton UIApplication object in response to important events

class.name: UIView
class.description: Defines a rectangular area on the screen and the interfaces for managing the content in that area.

class.name: UIViewController
class.description: Defines a rectangular area on the screen and the interfaces for managing the content in that area.

class.name: UIWindow
class.description: Defines a rectangular area on the screen and the interfaces for managing the content in that area.

class.name: UIWebView
class.description: Used to embed web content in your app, to move back and forward in the history of webpages, and to set some web content properties programmatically.

class.name: WKWebView
class.description: Displays interactive web content, such as for an in-app browser.

class.name: WKNavigation
class.description: Contains information for tracking the loading progress of a webpage.

class.name: NSJSONSerialization
class.description: Convert JSON to Foundation objects and convert Foundation objects to JSON.

class.name: NSURLConnection
class.description: Contains information for tracking the loading progress of a webpage.

class.name: NSURLSession
class.description: Provides an API for downloading content.

class.name: NSURL
class.description: Represents a URL that can potentially contain the location of a resource on a remote server, the path of a local file on disk, or even an arbitrary piece of encoded data.

class.name: NSURLRequest
class.description: Represent a URL load request in a manner independent of protocol and URL scheme.

class.name: NSMutableURLRequest
class.description: Subclass of NSURLRequest provided to aid developers who may find it more convenient to mutate a single request object for a series of URL load requests instead of creating an immutable NSURLRequest object for each load.

class.name: NSData
class.description: Provide data objects, object-oriented wrappers for byte buffers.

class.name: NSMutableData
class.description: Provide data objects, or object-oriented wrappers for byte buffers.

class.name: NSPurgeableData
class.description: Used when you have objects with bytes that can be discarded when no longer needed.

class.name: NSURLProtocol
class.description: Handles the loading of protocol-specific URL data.

class.name: NSURLComponents
class.description: Designed to parse URLs based on RFC 3986 and to construct URLs from their constituent parts.

class.name: NSXMLParser
class.description: Parse XML documents (including DTD declarations) in an event-driven manner.

class.name: NSXMLNode
class.description: Represents a xml node.

class.name: NSXMLDTD
class.description: Represents a DTD instance.

class.name: NSXMLDTDNode
class.description: Represents a DTD node.

class.name: NSXMLDocument
class.description: Represents a xml document.

class.name: NSXMLElement
class.description: Represents a xml element.

class.name: NSIndexSet
class.description: Represents an immutable collection of unique unsigned integers.

class.name: NSMutableIndexSet
class.description: Represents a mutable collection of unique unsigned integers.

class.name: UIControl
class.description: Implements common behavior for visual elements that convey a specific action or intention in response to user interactions.

class.name: UIButton
class.description: Is a view that executes your custom code in response to user interactions.

class.name: PKAddPassButton
class.description: Provides a button that is used to add passes to Wallet.

class.name: PKPaymentButton
class.description: Provides a button that is used either to trigger payments through Apple Pay or to prompt the user to set up a card.

class.name: UIDatePicker
class.description: Implements an object that uses multiple rotating wheels to allow users to select dates and times.

class.name: UIPageControl
class.description: Create and manage page controls.

class.name: UIRefreshControl
class.description: Provides a standard control that can be used to initiate the refreshing of a table views contents.

class.name: UISegmentedControl
class.description: A horizontal control made of multiple segments, each segment functioning as a discrete button.

class.name: UISlider
class.description: A visual control used to select a single value from a continuous range of values.

class.name: UIStepper
class.description: Provides a user interface for incrementing or decrementing a value.

class.name: UISwitch
class.description: Used to create and manage the On/Off buttons used

class.name: UITextField
class.description: Displays an editable text area in your interface.

class.name: NSControl
class.description: Base class for user interface controls

class.name: NSBrowser
class.description: Provides a user interface for displaying and selecting items from a list of data or from hierarchically organized lists of data such as directory paths.

class.name: NSButton
class.description: Sends an action message to a target object, such as a view controller, when the button is clicked.

class.name: NSColorWell
class.description: An NSControl for selecting and displaying a single color value.

class.name: NSDatePicker
class.description: Provides a user interface for displaying and editing an NSDate object.

class.name: NSImageView
class.description: Displays image data from an NSImage object in a frame.

class.name: NSLevelIndicator
class.description: Displays a value on a linear scale..

class.name: NSImageView
class.description: Displays image data from an NSImage object in a frame.

class.name: NSMatrix
class.description: Matrix input control

class.name: NSPathControl
class.description: Represents a file system path or virtual path..

class.name: NSRuleEditor
class.description: A view that allows the user to visually create and configure a list of options which are expressed by the rule editor as a predicate.

class.name: NSTextField
class.description: Input text field.

class.name: NSComboBox
class.description: Combo box (could be editable...).

class.name: NSSecureTextField
class.description: Password input text field.

class.name: NSSearchField
class.description: Search input field.
